```pddl
[
  (:action acquire
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?location - place ?resource - object)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent ?location) (available ?resource))
    :effect (and (inventory ?agent ?resource) (not (available ?resource)))
  ),
  
  (:action move ; Move an object to a location
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?location - place ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent ?location) (available ?item))
    :effect (and (at ?item ?location) (not (available ?item)))
  ),
  
  (:action clean ; Clean a location and update its status
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?location - place)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent ?location) (dirty ?location))
    :effect (not (dirty ?location))
  ),
  
  (:action finish ; Complete a task and update its status to finished
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?task - task)
    :precondition (in_progress ?task)
    :effect (and (completed ?task) (not (in_progress ?task)))
  ),
  
  (:action be_amazed
    :parameters (?npc - npc ?task - task)
    :precondition (completed ?task)
    :effect (amazed ?npc)
  ),
  
  (:action be_sad
    :parameters (?npc - npc ?task - task)
    :precondition (failed ?task)
    :effect (sad ?npc)
  ),
  
  (:action be_ready
    :parameters (?npc - npc ?task - task)
    :precondition (prepared ?task)
    :effect (ready ?npc)
  )
]
```
